title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 66.1 - Training of dogs on wild game
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 66.1 - Training of dogs on wild game

State Regulations
(a) No
person will take dog(s) afield for the purpose of training on wild game other
than wild black bear, raccoon, fox, bobcat and coyote, except from August 16th
to April 15th. (b) No person will
take dogs afield for the purpose of training on raccoon, fox, bobcat or coyote, except from July 1st to April 15th. (c) No person will take dogs afield for the
purpose of training on wild black bear except as permitted in section
187.2
of this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
66.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
